metadata.description: 18 production-tested skills for system administration and infrastructure management

plugins.name: admin-skills
plugins.description: System administration skills - Unix, Windows, WSL, DevOps, and MCP server management. 6 profile-aware skills.

plugins.name: infra-skills
plugins.description: Cloud infrastructure skills - DigitalOcean, Vultr, Linode, Hetzner, Contabo, and Oracle Cloud. 6 skills for multi-cloud deployments.

plugins.name: app-skills
plugins.description: Application deployment skills - Coolify self-hosted PaaS and Kasm Workspaces VDI platform.

plugins.name: tools-skills
plugins.description: Specialized tools - Stream Deck integration, ImageMagick processing, Cloudflare Python Workers, and MCP OAuth.
